pages.text: $(li)The Trapped Book is a new variant of the $(l:patchouli:decoration/inspirations/books)Books$(/l).$(br)$(li)This one placed in a $(l:patchouli:decoration/inspirations/shelfs)Shelf$(/l) will cause it to emit a redstone signal.
$(li)The strength of the signal is based on the slot of the book, from a strength of 2 at slot 1 to strength of 15 at slot 14.
